newsitem.title: USA: TSI TelSys names Peter Campisi CFO.
newsitem.headline: TSI TelSys names Peter Campisi CFO.

text.p: TSI TelSys Corp said Tuesday it named Peter Campisi as chief financial officer.
Campisi, who will oversee TSI's financial management and investor relations, previously served as chief financial officer of DavCo Restaurants Inc and Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Maryland Inc.
TSI TelSys was not immediately available to comment on whom, if anyone, Campisi replaces.
